data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Child actor restrictions (school hours, tutor, max 6 hours)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
